turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there, what would you like to do today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like the

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Purchase a Starbucks beverage a beverage from Starbucks, please. Can you help me out with that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: purchase starbuck beverage, sure i can.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let me see.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok what kind of coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: caramel macchiato?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: caramel macchiato.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Can I get a Grande with 2% milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok so thats caramel machiatto grande with 2% milk right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, and can you add whipped cream on top with drizzled caramel?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: with whipped cream and drizzle of caramel sauce is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok where are you close to, so i can find a store for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I live in Colorado Springs.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, we have a starbucks store at colorado springs.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure. Is it on 4th Street?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let me see.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: we have 134 North Tejon is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: wonderful, let me repeat your whole order for you real quick.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so we have 1 caramel machiatto grande with 2% milk with whipped cream and drizzle of caramel sauce is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: perfect, drink has been ordered at the store and will be ready for pickup shortly.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright. Thank you very much. I really appreciate your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, enjoy your coffee.
